file_content.text: Same setup as the others. Should I cut the blue wire again?
No--please hold. Yuun detects a different intent in this panel. The work of different hands, directed by different motives.
This panel is completely counter to the last--the red wire should be cut, rather than the blue.
Looks like we're good to go.
I think I'd better go with the blue wire ins--
No thanks. [Cut the blue wire]
Cowardly machine! Stand and fight!
Captain! Steady now, sir, you're alright.
Whoa! Easy there, Captain--that looked harsh.
Hehe... ahem. Sorry. Sir.
Gand apologizes--miscommunication has clearly resulted from poor explanation. Hopefully Gand can be clearer in the future.
There's only one way to be sure.
Forget that. [Shoot the panel]
Surely you won't--
You've got to be--
Sir, Yuun does not think--
Captain! Gand apologizes, sir, this was not the plan!
Our path is now clear, at least. Please proceed carefully, sir.
Didn't you see what happened when I cut the red wire? I wa--
No way! [Cut the blue wire.]
Imperial dogs! I will avenge your pain on them a hundredfold, Captain!
Sir, I... here. Just take this.
You have got to be kidding me.
Yuun does not know what to say. But the path to our quarry lies open, now--Yuun will stand by.
I prefer my way, Yuun.
Last one. [Shoot the panel.]
Sir, no! Not again!
No. No, you aren't really going to--
Sir, Yuun thinks--
No more cutting wires.
I'm done. [Shoot the panel.]
Captain! Please, sir--leave such duties to me in the future. It would be an honor to absorb such damaging blasts on your behalf!
Captain! Are you injured, sir?
I'm fine, Dorne, it's all right.
Negative.
I could have serious injuries. You'd better look me over.
[Flirt] Maybe.
Hmph. I think you'll make it, sir.
On second thought, I'm sure you'll be fine, sir.
This is nothing next to some of the hits I've taken.
It's nothing I can't handle.
Ugh. That didn't go very well.
That hurt.
These should reduce the pain somewhat, sir.
Captain? You still with us?
Everything's operational, Jorgan, don't worry about it.
I'll be fine.
What's this? Jorgan really cares?
[Flirt] Worried about me?
Can't have a squad without a CO.
I wouldn't go that far.
I'm not dead yet, Jorgan. Don't get ahead of yourself.
Hoping for a new job opening?
Good. I wouldn't want to have to deal with the paperwork.
Wow. That was not fun.
That hurt.
Don't go dying on us yet--we've got a lot left to do here.
Wow. That was pretty impressive, boss.
Yuun... Yuun does not understand your ways at all, Captain. But the path to knowledge is now clear.
Ouch. Hope that wasn't on purpose, boss.
Take that turret down!
Just blast it, Forex.
With pleasure, sir!
I prefer doing things my way.
Last one. [Shoot the panel.]
Make yourself useful, Specialist.
Just blast it, Vik.
Done. Stand clear!
I'd rather do it my way.
Last one. [Shoot the panel.]
Please, Captain--allow me!
Why don't I take care of this one, huh? Stand back.
Let me handle this, Captain!
Leave the demolitions to me, all right? Just stand back.
Yuun... had not conceived of this alternative.
The path to knowledge is cleared! Let us proceed, Captain--Yuun will stand by.
Done. [Cut the red wire.]
The path to knowledge is cleared! Let us proceed, Captain--Yuun will stand by.
